title: CSV Content Analyzer
description: Upload any CSV file to automatically analyze and describe what the dataset represents

pages.name: Home
pages.purpose: Drag-and-drop CSV upload, instant AI-generated summary of contents

interactions: onParseComplete calls window.geaRuntimeLLM to generate summary
display summary with column insights and data type guesses
acceptancecriteria: Accepts any CSV with unknown headers
Displays plain-language summary of dataset purpose
Lists guessed column meanings and data types
